hero_paragraph: We bring fresh snacks, drinks, and self-care products to your workplace or apartment. Fully serviced, cashless, and customized for your needs.

services.title: Snack & Drink Machines
services.text: Healthy and popular selections with real-time restock alerts.

services.title: Self-Care Products
services.text: Convenient access to personal items, always stocked.

services.title: Custom Mix
services.text: We tailor your machine to your location’s preferences.

faq.q: What types of products can I stock?
faq.a: Everything from snacks and drinks to self-care and specialty items.

faq.q: How soon can we get a machine?
faq.a: Installations usually take 2–3 weeks depending on location.
Placement is free. We handle service and upkeep; you just enjoy the convenience.
